rules: Rule1: Provided that garbage truck 7 is assigned to route A, route A is completed in the morning shift.
Rule2: If the recycling process was updated last quarter, then whenever it complies with regulation 15B, it is certified to the eco‑standard.
Rule3: Assuming the recycling process was audited last quarter, it follows that it was updated last quarter.
Rule4: Under the condition that plastic bale 23 is inspected by supervisor Jones, it is approved by supervisor Jones.
Rule5: Either plastic bale 23 is inspected by supervisor Jones or it is inspected by technician Smith.
Rule6: If plastic bale 23 is inspected by technician Smith, then in case it contains contaminants, it is suitable for remanufacturing.
Rule7: Provided that plastic bale 23 is approved by supervisor Jones, then if it contains contaminants, it is suitable for remanufacturing.
Rule8: Either plastic bale 23 is quarantined or it does not contain contaminants.
Rule9: Plastic bale 23 is hazardous, or else it is not quarantined.
Rule10: In the event that plastic bale 23 contains organic waste, it is not hazardous.
Rule11: Plastic bale 23 contains organic waste, or it contains metal shards.
Rule12: Should plastic bale 23 contain metal shards, it is not hazardous.
Rule13: If garbage truck 7 is on time for the morning shift, then it is assigned to route A.
Rule14: Whenever there is a malfunction of the compactor on garbage truck 7, garbage truck 7 is overloaded.
Rule15: If there is a traffic jam on highway 5 during the morning shift, then whenever garbage truck 7 is overloaded, it is rerouted to the backup route.
Rule16: Either there is a traffic jam on highway 5 during the morning shift, or there is roadwork on Elm Street during the morning shift.
Rule17: If a detour is active on Elm Street during the morning shift, then whenever garbage truck 7 is overloaded, it is rerouted to the backup route.
Rule18: When standard operations are in effect at the sorting facility, emergency protocol is not activated at the sorting facility.
Rule19: In the event that garbage truck 7 is delayed for the morning shift, it is assigned to route A.
Rule20: Provided that plastic bale 23 contains contaminants, it is not suitable for remanufacturing.
Rule21: Plastic bale 23 contains contaminants, or else garbage truck 7 is on time for the morning shift, or garbage truck 7 is delayed for the morning shift.
Rule22: Should plastic bale 23 be rejected during quality check, it does not contain contaminants.
Rule23: Whenever plastic bale 23 is sent to the landfill, it is rejected during quality check.
Rule24: The recycling process complies with regulation 15B, or plastic bale 23 is processed at the sorting facility, or plastic bale 23 does not contain contaminants.

Rule25: In case it is not true that if there is roadwork on Elm Street during the morning shift then a detour is active on Elm Street during the morning shift, emergency protocol is activated at the sorting facility.
Rule26: If garbage truck 7 is not assigned to route A, then there is a malfunction of the compactor on garbage truck 7.
Rule27: Provided that garbage truck 7 is not assigned to route A, it is not rerouted to the backup route.
facts: Fact1: The recycling process was audited last quarter.
Fact2: Standard operations are in effect at the sorting facility.
Fact3: Plastic bale 23 is sent to the landfill.
Fact4: Plastic bale 23 is not processed at the sorting facility.
Fact5: The recycling process is not certified to the eco‑standard.

question: Route A is completed during the morning shift.
